original_name: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt
plot: Dog and Beth switch gears and help other bail bond agencies who are on the brink of extinction, training them how to create a sustaining bounty hunter business.
plot_en: Dog and Beth switch gears and help other bail bond agencies who are on the brink of extinction, training them how to create a sustaining bounty hunter business.
plot_es: Dog and Beth switch gears and help other bail bond agencies who are on the brink of extinction, training them how to create a sustaining bounty hunter business.
title: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt
